events.message: Customer reported an auto accident involving their vehicle colliding with a streetlight on April 30th at approximately 6 PM.
Claim identified as an Auto Accident based on the details provided concerning the car collision and property damage.
An agent specializing in auto insurance claims was assigned to the customer's case to provide personalized assistance.
Acknowledgement sent to the customer confirming receipt of the auto accident claim and outlining the next steps to be taken.
Requested copies of police reports, photos of the vehicle damage, and any medical reports related to the collision for investigation.
Customer submitted all requested documentation, including police report and detailed photos of the damaged car after the accident.
Investigation team began reviewing submitted documents and contacted the customer for any additional clarification needed.
Completed the investigation confirming the collision was caused by a third party, validating the claim for repair costs.
Proposed a settlement offer to cover all vehicle damages as per the repair estimate provided by the authorized garage.
Customer responded positively to the settlement proposal and expressed satisfaction with the prompt handling of the claim.
The claim was formally approved and the settlement amount was authorized for payment without any objections.
Payment was issued to the customerâ€™s nominated bank account to cover the damages resulting from the auto accident.
The auto accident claim file has been officially closed following the successful settlement and payment completion.
All files and documentation related to the auto accident claim were archived in compliance with company data retention policies.
